subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Eric Mangini didn’t just flip on Bill Belichick, costing his former mentor a celebrated image, he also humiliated the respected Patriots owner and league power player Robert K. Kraft.
snippet: Eric Mangini didn’t just flip on Bill Belichick, costing his former mentor a celebrated image, he also humiliated the respected Patriots owner and league power player Robert K. Kraft.
